name: David Ramirez
text: Bread.     I like potatoes, pasta and rice too much.     Noodles also include ramen, chicken noodle soup, macaroni, lasagna.... I might give up rice before pasta actually.    Anyway, giving up bread, can substitute hash browns/some potato patty equivalent/ cabbage rolls for sandwiches and equivalents. For sweets, there's still ice cream, chocolate, yogurt.... Cheesecake without a crust would still pass the no bread condition....

source_obj.text: Bread.     I like potatoes, pasta and rice too much.     Noodles also include ramen, chicken noodle soup, macaroni, lasagna.... I might give up rice before pasta actually.
